version_description:
This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make HTTP Catcher better for you.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions, we'd love to hear from you.

This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make HTTP Catcher better for you.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions, we'd love to hear from you.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you have any questions, contact us. (email: gzhi1992@gmail.com)

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

If you have any questions, contact us. (email: gzhi1992@gmail.com)
+ Rewrite requests and responses
+ Rewrite requests and responses

+ Bug fixes and performance improvements.
+ Support iOS 9.

+ Bug fixes and performance improvements.
+ Support iOS 9.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

HTTP Catcher 1.1.0 is our big release.

In this version, we introduced a more advanced regular expression engine, new UI, and scheme support.

We also fixed bugs left over from previous versions and made stability improvements.

HTTP Catcher 1.1.0 is our big release.

In this version, we introduced a more advanced regular expression engine, new UI, and scheme support.

We also fixed bugs left over from previous versions and made stability improvements.

+ Add video playback to the response data.
+ Add a simple today widget.
+ Fixed an issue where parsing files failed.

+ Add video playback to the response data.
+ Add a simple today widget.
+ Fixed an issue where parsing files failed.
UI Improvements and bug fixes.
UI Improvements and bug fixes.
Improved stability and bug fixes.
Improved stability and bug fixes.

We've added a Wi-Fi access tool to this version. Now you can view http traffic in other device by HTTP Catcher.

Other stuff
* Swipe right session to copy url
* Improve export config
* Improve rewrite tool
* Improve hex viewer

We've added a Wi-Fi access tool to this version. Now you can view http traffic in other device by HTTP Catcher.

Other stuff
* Swipe right session to copy url
* Improve export config
* Improve rewrite tool
* Improve hex viewer
+ Filter sessions by MIME types
+ Filter sessions by MIME types

1. Dark Mode on iOS 13
2. Syntax highlighting
3. Save a request in favorites

2. Syntax highlighting

+ UX improvements on iPad
+ UI improvements
+ Support display sessions in reverse order
+ Support syntax highlighting
+ Improve long text loading speed

+ UX improvements on iPad

1. Support search blacklist and rewrite
2. DNS hijacking support directly rewrites the Host request header

This version supports viewing cookies.
This version supports viewing cookies.
Convert HTTP Catcher to freemium model with in-app purchase.
Convert HTTP Catcher to freemium model with in-app purchase.

Fix the bug that users who have previously paid to download cannot automatically unlock in some cases.

If you have paid to download HTTP Catcher before, please wait a few seconds after HTTP Catcher opens and the app will automatically unlock.

Fix the bug that users who have previously paid to download cannot automatically unlock in some cases.

If you have paid to download HTTP Catcher before, please wait a few seconds after HTTP Catcher opens and the app will automatically unlock.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

In this version, we have optimized some details and improved some functions.

1. Add rewrite read-only export
2. Support to import custom certificate
3. Rewrite add description field

In this version, we have optimized some details and improved some functions.

1. Add rewrite read-only export
2. Support to import custom certificate
3. Rewrite add description field

Hello everyone! Here comes HTTP catcher 2.0. We ushered in an annual major revision!

We refactored a lot of code, including improving the user interface and optimizing the packet capturing function.

Hope you like this update!

Hello everyone! Here comes HTTP catcher 2.0. We ushered in an annual major revision!

We refactored a lot of code, including improving the user interface and optimizing the packet capturing function.

Hope you like this update!

- Path rewrite supports regular replacement
- Support to view request header and response header source code
- Support URL Rewrite

- Path rewrite supports regular replacement
- Support to view request header and response header source code
- Support URL Rewrite

- Support export curl
- Unicode in message body can be automatically converted to characters
- Request can be deleted

- Support export curl
- Unicode in message body can be automatically converted to characters
- Request can be deleted

1. Support filtering response types in history
2. Support searching the content of message header and message body in history
3. URL rewriting supports modification of status codes, you can specify different redirect status codes
4. In the rewrit

We have added a 3 days free trial, and you can now use full features of HTTP catcher for 3 days.

We have also improved UI of HTTP catcher, and hope you will like it.
